content:
With the Paris Olympics approaching, why are people online obsessed with the idea that "gold medals are useless"?
Netizens said: Because food safety, education, employment, medical care, and elderly care are all more important than gold medals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 19, Shangluo, Shaanxi. According to Chinese official media reports, a sudden torrential rain and flash floods in Zhashui County caused the collapse of a highway bridge. As of 10:00 on the 20th, 5 vehicles had been found and 11 people had been killed. Preliminary verification showed that nearly 20 vehicles and more than 30 people were still missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today is the third anniversary of the July 20 flood in Zhengzhou
On July 20, 2021, many places in Henan suffered from rare heavy rains and floods. According to official statistics, 398 people died or went missing in Henan, including 380 in Zhengzhou. Among them, the flooding accident on Metro Line 5, which killed 14 people, and the flooding accident in the Jingguang North Road Tunnel, which killed 6 people, were the most well-known.
Afterwards, the State Council authorized the investigation team to disclose that the Henan local government concealed 139 deaths and missing persons.
Xu Liyi, then secretary of the Zhengzhou Municipal Party Committee of the Communist Party of China, was dismissed, and dozens of officials including the mayor and deputy mayor of Zhengzhou were also held accountable for this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Water conditions in Kaifeng, Henan on July 20.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of July 20, a flash flood disaster occurred in Xinhua Village, Hanyuan County, Ya'an, Sichuan, and communications, roads, and bridges were interrupted. According to the local emergency department, after preliminary investigation, more than 30 people were missing and more than 40 houses were damaged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 19, Tianjin. Netizens posted a video saying that a female tour guide lectured tourists, saying "spending money is God, not spending money is shit." Afterwards, the tour guide apologized to the tourists, saying that she had a brother who was paralyzed by gout at home and that she was anxious to make money.
Tianjin Tourism: The tour guide involved, Deng, had his tour guide license revoked last year and was an unlicensed tour guide. It is planned to impose a maximum fine of 30,000 yuan on him and confiscate his illegal gains.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 19 (Release), Liuzhou, Guangxi. The urban management officers confiscated the old man’s tricycle, and the old man lay under the urban management law enforcement vehicle, threatening to die.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 19, Mu Hong, member of the Party Leadership Group and Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, stated at the press conference of the Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee: The people's sense of gain, happiness and security continues to increase.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Han Wenxiu, deputy director of the Central Finance Office: We must expand domestic consumer demand and enhance the endogenous power and reliability of the domestic cycle. China is a large economy with great potential for domestic demand and internal circulation. As long as we do our own thing well, we can ensure that the national economy will circulate smoothly and steadily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Xinhua News Agency published an article: There is no so-called "positive energy rumor" in the world. Eradicating the soil for spreading rumors is the real positive energy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 20, Dr. Li Sheng, who was stabbed in the First Affiliated Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University, unfortunately passed away. The Chinese Medical Association issued a statement: firmly oppose any form of violent attacks on doctors, unswervingly defend the dignity of medical staff, call on relevant units to take effective measures to protect the lives of medical staff, and call on all sectors of society to work together to create a harmonious and orderly medical environment.
Xu Haijun, attending physician of the Emergency Department of the First Affiliated Hospital of Tsinghua University, wrote that Dr. Li Sheng's level in China is comparable to that of a giant panda, and it takes at least 10 years for a doctor with good qualifications and strong abilities to reach this level. It is much easier to see such top experts than to see pandas, but they do not get even a little bit of protection like pandas.

name: 李老师不是你老师

A 22-year-old woman in Guizhou was killed by her ex-boyfriend after she broke off her engagement
On July 19, many netizens said that a woman was killed by her ex-boyfriend in Majiang County, Guizhou Province. "He broke into her house at 4 a.m. and stabbed her 16 times."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The blogger "I am Liang Yong" once attracted attention for his life of "going from a technical secondary school in a county town to studying abroad in London". His profile said that he "washed dishes, started a business, and studied abroad". Recently, the official website of the School of Business and Economics of the New University of Lisbon refuted the rumor, saying that "Liang Yong is not a student of our school, and said that the blogger forged the admission letter and even claimed that he could help others get admitted in exchange for commissions."
